# bloodAlcoholContent

**Type Property**

A quantity sample type that measures the user’s blood alcohol content.

## Declaration

```swift
static let bloodAlcoholContent: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
```

## Discussion

These samples use percent units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]) and measure discrete values (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle]).

## Alcohol consumption

- **numberOfAlcoholicBeverages**: A quantity sample type that measures the number of standard alcoholic drinks that the user has consumed.
